title: Venison and mushroom pie
ingredients: ['2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '200 g (7 oz) small button onions, peeled and left whole', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) boneless haunch of venison or venison shoulder, diced', '150 g (5½ oz) baby button mushrooms', '3 celery sticks, thickly sliced', '1 tbsp fresh thyme leaves', '300 ml (10 fl oz) full-bodied red wine', '150 ml (5 fl oz) strong beef stock', '1½ tbsp cornflour', 'salt and pepper', 'Sweet potato mash', '1 kg (2¼ lb) sweet potatoes, cubed', '1 tbsp wholegrain mustard', 'grated zest and juice of 1 orange']
